triggers.text: Hello there! Nice to meet you!
Hi! Hows it going?
Hey! Whats up?
Good day! How can I assist you today?
I'm feeling a bit hungry...
Have you looked outside today?
What do you think about the weather?
I love chatting with you!
Did you hear about the latest news?
I just saw something really interesting!
Do you have any fun plans for today?
Sometimes I wonder about the universe...
I think it's time for a little break.
It looks like it might rain today.
The sun is shining brightly today!
I hope it stays warm this weekend.
Looks like we're in for some cold weather.
What is your favorite thing to do on weekends?
If you could travel anywhere, where would you go?
What is the best book you have ever read?
Do you prefer coffee or tea?
